review.title: “Dazed and Confused”
review.pros: Pros – The ownership is down to earth and the company has realistic expectations of people.Decent BenefitsFlexible SchedulesFun Happy Hours
review.cons: Cons – Constantly struggling with money, horrible bonuses two years in a row.Incompetent / non-existent leadership.Lacks the processes in place to support leadershipConstant passing of the buck and horrible communication with employees about everything.Large Turnover.Massive Org Chart changes every 6 months.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Establish leadership and quit brushing things under the rug. Be honest and forthright with your employees. Quit shuffling around the organizational chart.
